Title: Provides for the award of scholarships and loan forgiveness for dentists and podiatrists on the same terms as physicians
Summary: Provides for the award of regents scholarships and loan forgiveness for dentists and podiatrists on the same terms as physicians and dentists.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to regents professional education scholarships, health care professional opportunity scholarships and loan forgiveness for podiatrists and dentists
